name: espn-get-nfl-scores
description: Gets live NFL game scores, standings, and matchups with optional team filtering.
voice_triggers: what's the score in the Seahawks game?
author: cmac86

name: espn-get-nhl-schedule
description: Gets upcoming NHL games for a specified team with opponent and date information.
voice_triggers: When do the Canucks play next?
author: cmac86

name: google-tasks-add-task
description: Adds a task to Google Tasks with optional notes and due date.
voice_triggers: Remind me to submit the report by Friday
author: cmac86

name: notion-add-task
description: Adds a task to Notion with optional due date parsing (supports today, tomorrow, day names, and specific dates).
voice_triggers: Add task call mom due tomorrow
author: cmac86

name: notion-tasks
description: Manage tasks in your Notion database - get, add, complete, and delete tasks with support for due dates and filtering.
voice_triggers: Add task buy groceries due Friday
author: cmac86

name: sonarr
description: Manage Sonarr TV shows - view upcoming episodes and search your library.
voice_triggers: What TV shows are coming up?
Search for Breaking Bad on Sonarr
author: cmac86

name: truenas-control-app
description: Starts, stops, or restarts a TrueNAS app and polls for completion status.
author: cmac86

name: truenas-get-status
description: Gets TrueNAS system status including CPU, memory, storage pools, and running apps.
author: cmac86
